comment: So the Dems and their supporters (Soros) is doubling down again.. They know they are loosing.. Desperately trying anything they can.. I really hate how they USE people as pawns.. The most desperate and down trodden..

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / double-01

                              :ARG1 (p2 / political-party

                                          :op1 "Democrat"))))
                  :op2 (p3 / person

                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01

                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Soros")))))
            :mod (a2 / again))
      :snt2 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (t / they)
            :ARG1 (l / lose-03
                  :ARG0 t))
      :snt3 (d2 / desperate-02
            :ARG0 (t2 / they)
            :ARG1 (t3 / try-01
                  :ARG0 t2
                  :ARG1 (a3 / anything
                        :ARG1-of (p5 / possible-01))))
      :snt4 (h2 / hate-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 t2
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person)
                  :ARG2 (p7 / pawn))
            :degree (r / really))
      :snt5 (h3 / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 (p8 / person)
            :ARG2 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (d3 / despair-01
                        :ARG0 p8)
                  :op2 (d4 / dden-02
                        :ARG0 p8
                        :ARG1-of (d5 / down-03)))
            :ARG3 (m3 / most)))
